findings.name: use-nested-if
findings.message: Using nested is cheaper than using && multiple check combinations. There are more advantages, such as easier to read code and better coverage reports. Details: https://sg.run/dXw0

findings.name: use-prefix-decrement-not-postfix
findings.message: t-not-postfix Consider using the prefix decrement expression whenever the return value is not needed. The prefix decrement expression is cheaper in terms of gas. Details: https://sg.run/Z024
